snippet.title: The Sand Man EN PV
snippet.description:
“I’ll tell you a scary story. It’s so scary you might not be able to take it. It’s the story of the Sand Man...”
This is the second title in the Strange Man series, developed by Uri Games. Unable to sleep and exhausted, Sophie wanders into a town where everything sleeps. That is where the terror begins...
PLAYISM: http://playism-games.com/game/332/the-sand-man
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/741250/The_Sand_Man/
